Manual Setup

For a more custom approach, follow these steps to manually install the template system.

  • CSS: Include the stylesheet by copying the code below and adding it in <head> before all other stylesheets. 
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/css/themes/cards/styles.css">
  • JS: Include the scripts.js file by adding the following code immediately before </body>. 
    <script type="text/javascript" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/js/scripts.js"></script>
  • jQuery: Include jQuery by adding the following code immediately before </body>. 
    <script type="text/javascript" href="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script>
